column5: For those that fish or intent to fish the Reservoir Gouin in the province of Quebec' I suggest thst you read this : https://www.navionics.com/usa/blog/p...uin-reservoir/ Also the interactive map is only in French at this moment but they are working on a translation that should be ready soon. On that map you have the protected spawning areas, sites of interests, outfitters camp and many more. You can view the map here: http://www.afcgouin.ca/carte-interactive/
